thread.title: BRIEF-Aevi Genomic Medicine Expands Collaboration With Kyowa Hakko Kirin Co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Aevi Genomic Medicine Expands Collaboration With Kyowa Hakko Kirin Co

organizations.name: brief-aevi genomic medicine expands collaboration with kyowa hakko kirin co

text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Aevi Genomic Medicine Inc:
* AEVI GENOMIC MEDICINE INC - EXPANDED COLLABORATION WITH KYOWA HAKKO KIRIN CO LTD
* AEVI GENOMIC MEDICINE - SIGNING OF OPTION AGREEMENT FOR EARLY STAGE MONOCLONAL ANTIBODY PROGRAM IN AN ULTRA-ORPHAN PEDIATRIC INDICATION
* AEVI GENOMIC MEDICINE INC - FINANCIAL AND OTHER TERMS OF DEAL WERE NOT DISCLOSED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
